targets.expr: (1 - avg(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, cluster) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}) * 100

(1 - avg(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, cluster) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}) * 100

(sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"(user|idle)",instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance) / count(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance)) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

(sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", container!~"POD",image!="", cluster=~"$Account"}[5m])) by (node) / sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", container!~"POD", image!="", cluster=~"$Account"}[5m])) by (node))

sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{instance=~"$instance", job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right (nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$instance", job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right (nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

(
  sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance)
-
  sum(node_memory_MemFree_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance)
-
  sum(node_memory_Buffers_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance)
-
  sum(node_memory_Cached_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance)
) * on (instance) group_right (nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}
sum(node_memory_Buffers_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right (nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}
sum(node_memory_Cached_bytes{job="node-exporter", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right (nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

(sum(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", fstype!="", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance, device)
/
sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", fstype!="", cluster=~"$Account"}) by (instance, device))

((sum(irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance", device!="lo", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance) * 2) < sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance", device!="lo", cluster=~"$Account"}[1d])) by (instance) ) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

sum(irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="node-exporter", instance=~"$instance", device!="lo", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__interval])) by (instance) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}

sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="node-exporter", device!="lo", instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$Account"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, device) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{nodename=~"$node", cluster=~"$Account"}
